properties.areaDesc: Western Columbia River Gorge; Western Columbia River Gorge
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 4:26AM PST until January 18 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO
10 AM PST SATURDAY...

* WHAT...Snow, transitioning to freezing rain Saturday. Snow
accumulations of 1 to 3 inches this morning, then up to 7 inches
tonight through Saturday morning. Ice accumulations of up to one
third of an inch tonight through Saturday morning.

* WHERE...Western Columbia River Gorge.

* WHEN...Winter Weather Advisory is in effect until 10 AM this
morning, then a Winter Storm Warning is in effect from 4 PM this
afternoon to 10 AM Saturday morning.

* IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the
snow and ice. Major travel impacts are expected.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall totals will be Multnomah
Falls eastward. Snow is expected to gradually change to freezing
rain and then rain west of Multnomah Falls.
properties.instruction:
Significant amounts of snow and ice are forecast that will make
travel dangerous. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight,
food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING
